actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to eliminate the 5 month waiting period which is presently a prerequisite of eligibility for disability insurance benefits or the disability freeze.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Eliminates the month waiting period under title II (old-age, survivors, and disability insurance) of the Social Security Act for eligibility for disability insurance benefits or the disability freeze.

titles.title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to eliminate the 5 month waiting period which is presently a prerequisite of eligibility for disability insurance benefits or the disability freeze.
